survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of remote onboarding processes for new employees.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall remote onboarding process at your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall remote onboarding process at your company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of communication during your remote onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring clarity.

script.question_text: How would you rate the clarity of communication during your remote onboarding?

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during your remote onboarding? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during your remote onboarding? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully onboarded and comfortable in your role?
questions.client_notes: Use a time-based scale to measure onboarding duration.

script.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully onboarded and comfortable in your role?

questions.question_text: Did you receive adequate support from your manager during the remote onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/somewhat options to gauge manager support.

script.question_text: Did you receive adequate support from your manager during the remote onboarding process?

questions.question_text: What additional resources or support would have improved your remote onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional resources or support would have improved your remote onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the virtual team introductions during your onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring effectiveness.

script.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the virtual team introductions during your onboarding?

questions.question_text: Were you provided with clear goals and expectations for your role during onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Simple options to gauge clarity of role expectations.

script.question_text: Were you provided with clear goals and expectations for your role during onboarding?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your company's remote onboarding process to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood.
